DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Effect Enoxaparin Clopidogrel Improving Pregnancy Rate ICSI
DOC.detailed_description: Study setting : Assisted Reproduction unit Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital Study population : Patients underlie ICSI Assisted Reproduction unit Ain Shams University maternity hospital Intervention : After take write informed consent , patient recruit study undergo , detailed medical history complete clinical examination obtain along necessary laboratory investigation ultrasound finding The standard protocol Assisted Reproduction unit Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital induction ovulation ICSI patient long protocol give patient study . Endometrial sub-endometrial blood flow every patient 3 group assess transvaginal ultrasound use Medison Sonoace R5 ultrasound machine , eight hour give trigger , completely emptied bladder ( 2D power Doppler perform ) . This repeat one week day embryo transfer . Endometrial blood flow detect intra-endometrial adjacent sub-endometrial region within 10 mm echogenic endometrial border . Double thickness endometrium measure ( maximum distance myometrial/endometrial interface longitudinal axis uterus ) . The pulsatility index ( PI ) resistance index ( RI ) endometrial artery calculate . Analysis use together computer algorithms form index blood flow within endometrium . The parameter analyze software : ( ) resistance index ( RI ) : difference maximal systolic blood flow minimal diastolic flow divide peak systolic flow ( S-D/S ) ; ( ii ) pulsatility index ( PI ) : difference maximal systolic blood flow minimal diastolic flow divide mean flow throughout cycle ( S - D/mean ) ; ( iii ) ratio peak systolic flow low diastolic flow ( S/D ) . These three parameter express resistance flow point measurement downstream . The patient divide three group accord condition endometrial blood flow : In Group 1 , endometrial blood flow detect ; Group 2 sub-endometrial blood flow detect , Group 3 endometrial sub-endometrial blood flow detect . Pregnancy assess serum B-HCG test fourteen day embryo transfer , two week later trans-vaginal ultrasound perform insure presence gestational sac .
DOC.criteria: Age :2035yrs . 1 . Embryo transfer 3rd 5th day ovum pick . 2 . The transferred embryo four cell stage , eight cell stage , sixteen cell stage blastocyst stage . 1 . Age < 20 > 35 yr old . 2 . Chronic medical disease . 3 . Single embryo transfer . 4 . Previous ICSI failure .
